content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Resource Depot & Smelting Facility at base position (x=-4.5, y=18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-4.5, y=18.5) serving as the central storage depot.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-3.0, y=19.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates (status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warning: ["no ingredients to smelt"]).
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-4.0, y=21.0) used for processing copper ore into copper plates (status: NO_FUEL; warning: ["out of fuel"]).

### Automation Lab & Steam Power System (Integrated System)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (x=-7.5, y=18.5) used for automation research (status: NO_RESEARCH_IN_PROGRESS).
- Boiler at position (x=-5.5, y=24.0) used for generating steam (status: FULL_OUTPUT).
- Generator (Steam Engine) at position (x=-0.5, y=24.5) used to convert steam into electrical power (status: WORKING).
- Offshore Pump at position (x=-7.5, y=25.5) supplying water to the system.
- Electricity Group (id=352) with supporting small electric poles at positions:
   • (x=-0.5, y=11.5)
   • (x=-4.5, y=15.5)
   • (x=0.5, y=14.5)
   • (x=-5.5, y=18.5)
   • (x=-8.5, y=21.5)
   • (x=-2.5, y=24.5)
  for power distribution.
- Pipe Groups forming the fluid network:
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=1024) at position (x=-10.5, y=16.5) [Status: EMPTY].
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=1025) at position (x=-12.5, y=18.5) [Status: EMPTY].
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=1027) at position (x=-8.5, y=20.5) carrying water [Status: FULL_OUTPUT].
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=1029) at position (x=-2.5, y=21.5) carrying steam [Status: FULL_OUTPUT].

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────
- Entity Placement and Reference Issues:
  • Ensure the target location for placing an entity is buildable and unoccupied, using proper validation before placement.
  • Verify that reference variables for entities are correctly initialized to avoid misuse.

- Piping and Connection Issues:
  • Confirm that all connection points between structures (for example, between the Boiler and the Generator) are unblocked and aligned to allow fluid transfer.
  • When connecting pipes, check that both source and target sites are compatible; errors such as “Did not find any valid connections” indicate misaligned or obstructed connection points.

- Inventory and Crafting Dependencies:
  • Verify that all required items are available in inventory before attempting connections. If a connection fails due to missing small electric poles (e.g. “Required number – 5, Available – 0”), ensure adequate stock prior to execution.
  • Also, confirm that inventory carries sufficient resources for both electrical and fluid connection components.

- Electrical Network Stability:
  • Ensure that after connecting power components, the Electricity Group reports a positive voltage. A zero voltage reading indicates that the power network configuration is incomplete or improperly connected.
  
- (Include previous best practices on buildable area checks and correct property access to prevent placement errors.)
